Use natural cleaning methods: Without soap and cleaning products, we can still maintain hygiene by using natural cleaning methods like using baking soda and vinegar, lemon juice, and salt. We can use these ingredients to clean our homes and bodies.
Use water: Water is an excellent natural cleaner and disinfectant. We can use it to clean our homes, wash our hands, and even clean our clothes.
Use essential oils: Essential oils like tea tree oil, lavender oil, and peppermint oil have antimicrobial properties and can be used as natural cleaning agents.
Use natural brushes: We can use natural brushes like bamboo, corn, or beeswax brushes to clean our homes and bodies.

Use sunlight: Sunlight has natural disinfectant properties, and we can use it to clean our homes and clothes. We can also open our windows and doors to let in fresh air and sunlight to maintain hygiene.
